accountcustomization.info: Customize your account with a variety of options; some selections may require an Upper Staff member to assist you.

symbol.onbuy:
You have purchased a Custom Symbol. To activate your custom symbol, you can set it with with /customsymbol [symbol];
once you set your symbol, you'll need to purchase this again to set a new one.
You can remove your symbol with /resetsymbol.
symbol.info: Redeems a custom symbol to go in front of your name. (Temporary until restart, or untill you log off for an hour)

globaldeclare.onbuy: You have purchased a Global Declare. To redeem your Global Declare, do /usetoken declare, [message you want declared]
globaldeclare.info: Globally declares a message to every user ( via pm ) on the server. (Cannot be used for server advertisements, message must be approved by an administrator.)

customavatar.onbuy:
You have purchased a Custom Avatar. To redeem your Custom Avatar, do /usetoken avatar, [avatar image]
Inappropriate images may be denied; 80x80 is the optimal image resolution.
customavatar.info: Redeems a custom avatar to be applied to your name (You supply, must be .png or .gif format. Images must be 80x80 to display properly.)

customcolor.onbuy:
You have purchased a Custom Name Color. To redeem your Custom Color, do /usetoken color, [hex color code]
Colors must be easily visible on the website.
customcolor.info: Redeems the ability to have your name color changed. Difficult to see colors are not allowed.

title.onbuy: You have purchased a Custom Title. To redeem your Custom Title, do /usetoken title, [title], [hex color code]
title.info: Redeems a custom title that appears on your profile, in a custom color. Titles that are deamed inappropriate will be rejected.

emote.onbuy: You have purchased an Emoticon. To redeem your Emoticon, do /usetoken emote, [emote name], [image]
emote.info: Add an emote to the server. You supply the image. Innappropraite images or names may be denied.

icon.onbuy:
You have purchased a Userlist Icon. To redeem your Userlist Icon, do /usetoken icon, [image]
Inappropriate images may be denied; must be a 32x32 image.
icon.info: Redeems an Icon to be set next to your name on the userlist. (Must be 32x32)

profilemusic.onbuy: You have purchased a Profilr Music. To redeem your Profile Music, do /usetoken profilemusic, [link], [name].
profilemusic.info: Redeems an Profile Music to be set in your profile.

profilebackground.onbuy:
You have purchased a Profile Background. do /usetoken profilebackground, [image]
Inappropriate images may get deleted.
profilebackground.info: Reedems a Profile Background to set as your profile background.

roomshop.onbuy: You have purchased a room shop. do /usetoken roomshop, [room name]
roomshop.info: Redeems a Room shop for your room.

sggame.info: Extra items to help you out in the alpha test. Please note that save data may be wiped after the alpha test ends

berry1.onbuy: You have purchased 30 random berries for SGgame Alpha. The berries have been added to your bag, close and reopen your bag if its open to get them to display.
berry1.info: 30 random berries for SGgame Alpha. Possible berries: Cheri, Pecha, Rawst, Chesto, Aspear, Persim, Oran, Sitrus, Lum, Leppa

berry2.onbuy: You have purchased 30 random berries for SGgame Alpha. The berries have been added to your bag, close and reopen your bag if its open to get them to display.
berry2.info: 30 random berries for SGgame Alpha. Possible berries: Aguav, Apicot, Babiri, Charti, Chilan, Chople, Coba, Colbur, Custap, Enigma, Figy, Ganlon, Haban, Iapapa, Jaboca, Kasib, Kebia, Kee, Lansat, Liechi, Mago, Maranga, Micle, Occa, Passho, Payapa, Petaya, Rindo, Roseli, Rowap, Salac, Shuca, Starf, Tanga, Wacan, Wiki, Yache
